title: Titan Forge Fitness
subtitle: High-Performance Gym & Athlete Hub
description: A dynamic fitness platform designed for high-intensity training centers. It features integrated class scheduling, membership tiers, and a mobile-responsive interface optimized for athletes on the go.
story: This project was about capturing the raw energy of a forge. We moved away from generic fitness templates to create a high-contrast, motivating digital environment that reflects the physical intensity of the gym.

title: Justice Chamber
subtitle: Legal Consultancy & Firm Portal
description: A professional digital presence for legal practitioners. This platform organizes complex legal services into an intuitive architecture, featuring appointment booking and secure client inquiry forms.
story: Trust is the currency of the legal profession. I built Justice Chamber to communicate authority and reliability through minimalist typography and a structured information hierarchy.

title: Professional Persona D3
subtitle: Interactive Developer Showcase
description: A sophisticated portfolio template built to highlight technical skills and project archives. Features custom transition effects and a content-first layout designed for the modern tech professional.
story: Built as part of our internal D3 design sprint at TechWisdom, this project explores how to balance heavy project data with a clean, non-distracting user interface.
